name: axe-core
description: The project for automation testing opportunities accessibility
author: Andrii Peretiatko Â® 2023

scripts.report: npx rimraf allure-report allure-results playwright-report tests/tests-out && tsc --incremental -p tests/tsconfig.json && npx playwright test -c tests/UI/ --reporter=line,allure-playwright && allure generate allure-results -o allure-report --clean && npx allure open ./allure-report
scripts.generate_report: tsc --incremental -p tests/tsconfig.json && npx playwright test -c tests/UI/ --reporter=line,allure-playwright && allure generate allure-results -o allure-report --clean && npx allure open ./allure-report
scripts.clean: npx rimraf allure-report allure-results tests/tests-out playwright-report test-results
